rotate_switch_clockwise.description: Rotate the switch clockwise to turn on the faucet.

rotate_switch_anticlockwise.description: Rotate the switch anticlockwise to turn off the faucet.

clean_switch.description: Clean the switch to keep it hygiene.

rotate_switch_cw.description: Rotate the switch clockwise to adjust water temperature.

clean_switch_twice.description: Clean the switch twice to ensure it stays in good functioning.

rotate_switch_ccw.description: Rotate the switch Counter clockwise to adjust water temperature.

rotate_switch_again.description: Rotate the switch again to ensure smooth rotation.

clean_switch_once_more.description: Clean the switch once more to remove any grime deposited.

rotate_switch.description: Rotate the switch to adjust the water flow.

slide_stem_up.description: Slide the stem up to increase the flow.

slide_stem_down.description: Slide the stem down to decrease the flow.

clean_stem.description: Clean the stem to preserve hygiene.

press_stem_beginning.description: Press the stem at the beginning to start the water flow.

slide_stem_upwards.description: Slide the stem upwards to increase water flow.

slide_stem_downwards.description: Slide the stem downwards to reduce water flow.

polish_stem.description: Polish the stem to ensure it remains clean and shiny.

press_stem_end.description: Press the stem at the end to terminate the water flow.

slide_stem.description: Slide the stem to regulate the flow of water.

slide_out_stem.description: Slide the stem out to reduce the water flow.

clean_stem_again.description: Clean the stem once again to remove any residual dirt.

press_stem.description: Press the stem to start the flow of water.

clean_faucet_base.description: Clean the faucet base to keep the hygiene.

clean_base.description: Clean the base to maintain the look and hygiene of the faucet.

wipe_faucet_base.description: Wipe the faucet base to maintain the shine and cleanliness.

clean_all.description: Clean all parts of faucet to maintain hygiene.

operate_faucet.description: Operate the faucet to get water.

regular_cleaning.description: Clean all parts of faucet regularly including the stem, switch, and base.

total_management.description: Total management involves cleaning and adjusting all parts of the faucet.

maintain_whole_faucet.description: Maintain the entire faucet including the stem, switch, and base.

clean_whole_faucet.description: Clean the entire faucet including the stem, switch, and base.
